comments.body: Vewy gud
Very good idea! For builders as a decoration is not enough. For potions of poison this is the very thing! For they are rarely cooked as it is.
This is SUCH a good idea!
a way to kill mobs without destorying the blocks, neat!
It'd be fun to blast mine for netherite with this!
Could also have a black and blue texture?

I love this idea. I think it should be a big challenge to make it though. Maybe the same recipe as Regular TNT but require Ghast Tears instead of Gunpowder, or even gunpowder and a Nether Star. Would love it if it broke blocks though, maybe due to the challenge it could be more powerful than regular TNT, and explode leaving blue fire.
Another option would be for it to "implode" by pulling all of the blocks broken by a normal TNT explosion to the location of the TNT, and also pull mobs/players toward it.
makes soul instead of explosion particles

I would like to think of it not for its value with souls but rather it's rich Sulfur content. Especially with its lore as responsible for creating explosive creatures like ghasts and the wither, it should instead act with much more power like that of a charged creeper/end crystal

Minecarts need a complete makeover. The physics are all wrong. Merging does not work. Pushing a loaded cart is a trial (as in a pain in the …). 

All minecarts should have the same "mass". Collisions should be "elastic" as in conservation of momentum and kinetic energy. (Maybe a slight loss of energy)  Connections between minecarts should be deterministic not random events. Minecarts should have a "brake". How about the "P" key, multiple strokes that each remove a small amount of energy.

Basically forget the "frills" until the basics are fixed.
This would be a great feature for part 2 of the caves and cliffs update.

This is needed so badly.  Either Concrete or Terracotta.  Right now we have no option to color stairs which would enhance builds greatly.

Blue rooves that you see in Greece

Red "Tiled" rooves that you see in Spain and the Mediterranean

or just for making the 'Onion Domes' seen throughout Eastern Europe

They are just needed!

This should really get more votes and be pinned by the devs. 

I absolutly agree. I struggle with buidling some detailed stuff which are possible with the current slabs and stairs but im a bit done using Wood all the time and want a "just red stair" and the closest options are Red Nether bricks or Acacia wood which either isnt what Im looking for or are hard to obtain for the average survival player. Heck even in survival there barely is an option for colored slabs and stairs except for the new crimson and warped woods.

Concrete should definetly be the solution to this. It makes Sand and Gravel all the more useful and they are just good old plain solid color. Perhaps even Deepslate with those Tiles that could be colored in the 15 other colors. Than we have all the roofs we would ever need.
I’m surprised this doesn’t have more votes

I agree there needs to be a way to get more building materials/parts that you can build out of colorful concrete like stairs and half slabs. There aren't enough choices in stairs anymore and have gotten bored with the current choices! DEVS: Please give us the ability to make new things out of concrete so we can add actual real colour to our builds by way of stairs, slabs etc!

We've been asking for so long please give us what we want. This should be available for bedrock and java
There's already a large thread for this under review by mojang.
Esa me gusto. Vota por la mia Las Mochilas
si la verdad es que yo también lo pienso sobretodo mueren muy fácil con los cactus

Si estaria chido la armadura para lobos
Ya que tienen poca vida

Maybe not shurikens but like new tools like he said like better swords and other tools like putting the sword in the a anvil or smithing table with a diamond and making it diamond edge or the same with other materials
New weapons will be added into the game and Surikens are a type of weapon so I would imagine them being crafted in this form.
These are suggestions used in the post so if you want to see a post saying that surikens being added into the game just type in the word suriken in the search box. :D
A new weapon could be a katana and samurai armor and knights armor and a long sword
I had an idea to implement this that I posted if you want to check it out.

I think it needs to be similar to the Tinker's Construct Mod. Maybe it can make parts of a weapon or tool that can be used to upgrade existing weapons, like with netherite and diamond. It could also be used to repair weapons/tools or add small buffs to them (haste, etc) that arent as powerful as the normal version but are permanent to the tool.

What if we could upgrade iron and gold tools at the smithing table into steel and rose gold, respectively. I would use a diamond to upgrade to steel and copper to upgrade to rose gold. Steel will be slow but will have high durability. Rose gold will be as fast as gold but will have durability between iron and gold. These tool types should be designed to help the player in the early game, but still incentivize players to upgrade to diamond and then to netherite.
As long as they require a certain Smithing Template, certainly!
Question: Have you ever gone up and down with Rails?
You can already do that!
Oh my gord I'm so sorry! I totally got the wrong idea!
Oh and add the opportunity to put rails on the side of blocks too.
I agree! They should add upside down rails and side rails! That would help a lot of Theme Park Builders, or any in general!
Yeh especially if someone wants to make a theme park server
I agree and also they should add a POV button for when you are on Minecraft’s so it will be like real rollercoasters and you don’t have to turn your camera
It’s a great idea but, the player should get the effect “nausea” while doing so. Also, if the Minecart is going to slow, the player will fall and take damage.

I love the idea the idea I actually really wanted these rails a while back but that was before I knew there was a way to give feedback. I really hope these will be added. They could at least make a “sticky” rail that goes any direction. It could be crafted with a rail and a slime ball.
That would be super cool! I know so many people want to be able to place rails on the side of blocks, upside down, directly down and up, and in a loop!
Though I like the idea,you need to add more than "upside down" you need to add up and side.But I still Vote and follow your post!
We should add upside down rails

This sounds interesting, but I'm not sure a potion makes a lot of sense if it's only ever going to work on baby animals.  Potions are first and foremost drinkable.  Even though pretty much nobody drinks a potion of poison or harming, those are the initial forms of the splash potions and tipped arrows that people use on other mobs and players.  Your youth potion would have no effects in this drinkable form.

I do like the idea, but I think it needs to be in a different from.  Maybe a rare plant that can be fed to a herbivore or crafted with meat to be fed to your puppy.

Obtain: Use a youth herb (@ClayGoddessSari) on a mundane potion in a brewing stand

Use: 

  • Make adult mobs babies (Splash)
  • Make baby mobs always stay babies (Splash)
  • Make the player "young"*

*I think it should have an effect on Players: It should give eternate speed and jump boost. 

 

Is that a good idea?

1.whats your meaning of "young players"?!?!?!?!?!? 2.i disagree it to be an effect/potion. i have a good replacing idea:u have to craft a special food with wither rose in middle, sugars in right and left, spider eyes in up and down and gold ingots on corner, when you give it to an animals, if its adult, it turns to a baby animal after 10min (EXACTLY like giving golden apple to zombie villagers!!with a blue fading particle,...). and if you give it to a baby animal, it "unrecovers" its grow ( :I i mean it act like a negative food. sorry im not a native english speaker). also this food can affect mobs like zombie and even plants!! i dont have any idea about this foods name, how about: wither cereal? XD

I feel potions are too easy. It should be an item, like the totem of youth, or a nametag. An item you use on your pet, and it needs to be rare. It should be found in Woodland Mansions or Shipwrecks or Desert temples. Uncraftable

I have an idea, instead of potion , you should craft an item, made with rare materials, which you use on your pet.

I feel heart of the sea, combined with another item, would be perfect for it
i gave you a stack of votes
Yes!!! I want a baby pig and a baby sheep as a pet. Maybe the potion would also change its behavior so it follows the player and will stay when the player tells it to sit, similar to a wolf or a cat.
Yes, I would like a way to keep baby villagers from growing up as I’m thinking of building some parks/playgrounds in my world and that way it could look like there are kids playing on them.
You could have the opposite potion as well, a potion that ages creatures

Sounds hard to code and weird - this is a portal to Hell we are talking about, why should it be heart shaped?!

Maybe make a big Nether portal, and block parts of it so that it looks like a heart shape.
Exactly.  You can do quite a bit with an oversized nether portal and blocking your view of parts of it.
Circled shape portal would be a plus. :)
Yes any portal shape that would fit into them maximum portal size.
It's pronounced heart h e a r t heart. Just saying
We should be able to make portals of any size and shape as long as the obsidian connects into a loop, it should all be fine.

the shape can still normal, it will be more dificult to give more obsidian, will obstruct some speedruns, the chang i want is when you arrive in the nether, I wanted the portal to generate in the nether as a ruin, but intact, as if the portal had been driven into the ground, and that when it did, it had around 2 ~ 3 crying obsidian, which I would contest with the ruin of the portal
Good idea.
I like it, gives them a purpose.
If they did it to cows.
Honestly if the temperature system gets added in, this could serve its purpose.
And dyeable fur clothes

The whole reason why lots of new passive mobs don't drop anything is because Mojang doesn't want people to kill passive mobs for no reason that defeats the purpose of them adding polar bears to advocate global warming
Why would they encourage killing an endangered and beloved species

If you stay in the cold for too long, you could slow down slightly and take about 2 damage per 10 seconds
Polar bear fur negates this completely.
I lost my dragon egg too so something like this would be nice. There should definitely be a way to get back a lost dragon egg, whether by it respawning or getting another one somehow.
I think if the egg is destroyed there should also be a message in the chat saying that it returned to the end
I did the exact same thing. Gone forever. This would be extremely useful.
It should only respawn if the Dragon is killed. If the Dragon is respawned, the egg should not reappear until the Dragon has been killed again
I did the exact same thing too
Perfect Idea
Yeah my dragon egg was also destroyed upon respawning, and I now am confused. Are you only able to beat the dragon 3 times?
I really think they should fix this bug

Same thing happened to me. This would be very nice.

Especially if it said a message in chat telling you about it.
I dropped the dragon egg in lava by accident in my survival world. I don't think you can get it back, but it doesn't really matter in a world, just as a trophy to display.
I think it should give you a dragon egg when you beat the dragon. Also when the egg is destroyed, it should say something like "The Dragon Egg has been destroyed."
For extra safety precautions, the egg should also be immune to fire and explosions.
So, would that mean that they introduce new dies and that items you would usually build a house with would have a colored counterpart?
Q: Would this be compatible with riptide and not loyalty? I feel like it shouldn't be compatible with loyalty but with riptide,to make it more useful.
PowerNinja1304 Yes it would. The enchantment would only work if you riptide towards the ground.
Please vote :)
I don’t agree bc the old one is ugly
it will be to op.But maybe bait to make people love you and follow you like a dog for 20 seconds maybe
I dont think turtles are the best option, since they are slow and you can't really ride them. Although, what if you could ride dolphins and use dolphin armor?
You can ride skeleton horses
You predicted the nautilus
It would be hilarious to try bartering with piglins with an ore like this. I can imagine them inspecting it then chucking it at the player hard enough to hurt you a bit lol.
That would be funny but it doesn't seem very minecraty
i love this idea
I love this idea
So you can smelt those minerals into lava for more buckets of lava? If so then I'm in. It makes perfect sense. Also like the idea with the cobble = magma blocks idea. :)
Thanks!
Although lava is easily obtainable in minecraft, there would have to be for more purposes than just melting blocks to create lava and the fiery blocks.
Also melt things already made like gold horse armor make it liquid and than crafted into a gold ingot and iron too..
This is probably too ridiculous to ever but put in the game, but I still love it to bits.

I don't see this happening in game just because the Dragon Egg is one of a kind and it can't more then one in a survival world. I agree with it being an April Fool's joke but in the game forever is a no go.
Actually, you can do a ritual thing to respawn the ender dragon, watch a YouTube video.
That's a very great and usefull idea !
I'm aware that you can respawn the ender dragon but it doesn't drop the egg.
I would rather the dragon egg have a dragon that you can ride on.
yes big omelette
That's a very good idea.

great idea! i think this would be a great fit into minecraft, it would add so much colour and detail. the crystals could have a similar mechanic to amethyst, where they grow on the block. i think that bismuth crystals would look so cool on display. anyways this is definitely deserving of more votes. great idea!

+1 vote
Also allows you to gain some exp without filling your inventory with a type of fish you don't want, the good ol' catch and release
No
good idea, this can be useful by throwing the ball towards mobs and make them fall to their death
I love that idea!
Just use an egg and a stick and you have baseball!
Yes! It would me great on making it like Mini World: Block Art.
maybe it would be better if it worked like the bow, the longer you charge it for, the further it goes
I think this would be a perfect addition to Minecraft because for every set of armor their is a weapon. But the chain mail armor lacked a weapon of its own
But, you already can sneak to avoid falling off scaffolding
I actually thought about a way that you can place scaffoldings without using the ground but to hang them to ceilings or wall, like the ones that are used for washing the glasses of the top towers.
